spec_data.Name: perl-LWP-MediaTypes
spec_data.Description:
This module provides functions for handling media (also known as MIME)
types and encodings. The mapping from file extensions to media types is
defined by the media.types file. If the ~/.media.types file exists it is
used instead. For backwards compatibility we will also look for
~/.mime.types.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 12:44:26 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Guess media type for a file or a URL
